org.terrier.structures.integer

Class IntegerCodingPostingOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.structures.AbstractPostingOutputStream
      • org.terrier.structures.integer.IntegerCodingPostingOutputStream

  • public class IntegerCodingPostingOutputStream
extends AbstractPostingOutputStream
    This class is used to store a posting list to the disk, compressing it using some integer coding technique. It can be used to save IterablePosting with (optionally) fields and/or blocks. Note: this class writes the posting list in chunks, whose size is specified by chunkSize.
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Matteo Catena

    • Constructor Detail

      • IntegerCodingPostingOutputStream

        public IntegerCodingPostingOutputStream(String filename,
                                int chunkSize,
                                int fieldsCount,
                                int hasBlocks,
                                IntegerCodec idsCodec,
                                IntegerCodec tfsCodec,
                                IntegerCodec fieldsCodec,
                                IntegerCodec blocksCodec)
                                 throws IOException
        Parameters:
        filename - the file where to write
        chunkSize - the chunk size (in term of number of posting)
        fieldsCount - the number of fields, if any. 0 otherwise
        hasBlocks - 0:no blocks, 1:positions, 2:blocks of any size!=1
        idsCodec - the IntegerCodec to use to compress ids
        tfsCodec - the IntegerCodec to use to compress tfs
        fieldsCodec - the IntegerCodec to use to compress fields (null if there are no fields)
        blocksCodec - the IntegerCodec to use to compress blocks (null if there are no blocks)
        Throws:
        IOException

      • IntegerCodingPostingOutputStream

        public IntegerCodingPostingOutputStream(ByteOut output,
                                int chunkSize,
                                int fieldsCount,
                                int hasBlocks,
                                IntegerCodec idsCodec,
                                IntegerCodec tfsCodec,
                                IntegerCodec fieldsCodec,
                                IntegerCodec blocksCodec)
                                 throws IOException
        Parameters:
        output - the output channel
        chunkSize - the chunk size (in term of number of posting)
        fieldsCount - the number of fields, if any. 0 otherwise
        hasBlocks - 0:no blocks, 1:positions, 2:blocks of any size!=1
        idsCodec - the IntegerCodec to use to compress ids
        tfsCodec - the IntegerCodec to use to compress tfs
        fieldsCodec - the IntegerCodec to use to compress fields (null if there are no fields)
        blocksCodec - the IntegerCodec to use to compress blocks (null if there are no blocks)
        Throws:
        IOException
